item.title: To overcome token limits @shaokaiyeah built a dual-memory system, inspired by “fast and slow” systems in neuro🧠, which can store to disk or RAM! This can be quickly recalled and loaded by the user. In many ways, #AmadeusGPT is like it’s own OS, with a special syntax 🪄🔮🤓 /end

item.title:
This is a 3D HREM visualization by Richard Behringer of a human embryo in its fifth week

item.title: Paper cuts are so painful because at a microscopic level paper is quite rough. A knife makes a straight cut, but paper acts like a saw blade and does more damage to nerve endings. r = eˢⁱⁿᶿ - 2 cos4θ + sin⁵[(2θ-π)/24]
